column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The hostess was wonderful and polite
column2: but after being seated our server was another story. Our first interaction was a "hello
column3: be right there" said in passing as he went to other tables. I wrote it off as him being busy
column4: I understand how hectic restaurant week can get. But as time passed and tables left
column5: it didn't get any better. Every time we were ordering
column6: his eyes were darting around the room like we were wasting his time.
